text:
A Dark Path Ahead

Raskolnikov stands tense, eyes fierce.  
Sonia watches, confusion swirling.  
Raskolnikov: “I abandoned my family today.”  

---  

Sonia gasps, fear creeping in.  
Sonia: “What for?”  
Raskolnikov: “I have only you now.”  

---  

Raskolnikov’s eyes burn with madness.  
Sonia: “Go where?”  
Raskolnikov: “I don’t know. Same road.”  

---  

Sonia trembles, lost in despair.  
Sonia: “I don’t understand.”  
Raskolnikov: “You will. You’ve transgressed too.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov confesses to Sonia that he has severed ties with his family and seeks to share a path of despair with her, both feeling accursed.
